description.overview: Wellness represents your daily health routines, work-life balance, and overall sense of physical and mental wellbeing.
description.detailed: This meter tracks transits through your 6th house (daily routines, health, work habits) and aspects to your natal Moon, Mars, and Saturn. The 6th house shows how your day-to-day life is functioning - work stress, health habits, sleep, exercise, and self-care. The Moon affects emotional wellness and self-nurturing. Mars shows physical energy management. Saturn reveals stress, boundaries, and sustainability of routines. When these are well-aspected, your routines support your health. Challenging aspects create work stress, neglected self-care, or unsustainable habits.

primary_planets.moon: Emotional wellness, self-nurturing, daily comfort needs
primary_planets.saturn: Work stress, boundaries, sustainable routines vs. burnout

secondary_planets.jupiter: Can support wellness or encourage overindulgence

key_houses.6: Daily routines, health habits, work-life balance, self-care practices

aspect_weights.conjunction: Maximum wellness impact - peak health or peak stress
aspect_weights.opposition: High impact - tension between work and rest
aspect_weights.trine: High flow - healthy routines come naturally
aspect_weights.square: Moderate friction - work stress or habit challenges
aspect_weights.sextile: Moderate flow - opportunities for better routines

interpretation_guidelines.tone: Practical and health-focused - talk about routines, work-life balance, self-care
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_high: Emphasize establishing healthy routines, prioritizing self-care, sustainable habits
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_low: Emphasize gentle self-care, not judging neglect, small habit changes
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_challenging: Acknowledge work stress or burnout risk - offer concrete self-care strategies

phrasing_examples.high_harmonious: Your wellness is strong today - healthy routines feel natural and self-care is easy. This is a good time to establish habits that stick.
phrasing_examples.moderate_mixed: Work-life balance takes effort today - be intentional about breaks and don't let work stress crowd out basic self-care.
phrasing_examples.low_challenging: Burnout risk is real today - your routines aren't supporting you right now. Prioritize rest and boundaries over productivity.
